judges: Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell and Mr. Justice Barbieri took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Robert L. Campbell, Assistant District Attorney, with him Carol Mary Los, Assistant District Attorney, and Robert W. Duggan, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Borghini (et al., Appellant).
Argued September 30, 1971.
Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Allen N. Brunwasser, for appellant.
Robert L. Campbell, Assistant District Attorney, with him Carol Mary Los, Assistant District Attorney, and Robert W. Duggan, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
December 20, 1971:
